pages.text: The many natural light sources in this biome allow plants to grow here that you might find on the surface, unlike most other biomes.$(br)Lakes of $(l:magical_blocks/liquid_crystal)Liquid Crystal$() and giant $(l:dimension/hummingstone)crystalline structures$() define it's look.
Stone covered with a small layer of Soil. Not much, but more than enough to be covered with a thick carpet of moss.

pages.title: Nephrite Blossoms
pages.text: Small little trees, as big as they get down here. Actually it's more like a big bush.$(br)...or giant shrub.$(br2)Eeeeh, details.$(br)Anyways, they look pretty.

No, they are not made out of glass, but very much shimmer like they are. They are very much edible, and tasty, too.$(br)Eating one will give you a short burst of $(thing)Toughness$(), which will decrease the damage hard-hitting attacks deal to you. They can also be $(l:magical_items/infused_beverages)fermented$() and $(l:brewing/potion_workshop_brewing)used to brew Potions$().

pages.title: Jadeite Blossoms
pages.text: Imposing vines are hanging from the high ceiling and break through the darkness with their light.
They act as $(l:brewing/potion_workshop_reagents)act as Potion Reagent$()
